text: 350px Self-portrait at an Easel or Self-portrait in the Studio is a 1790-1795 cabinet-format portrait by Francisco de Goya, now in the Real Academia de Bellas Artes de San Fernandohttp://goya.unizar.es/InfoGoya/Obra/Catalogo_/Pintura_/256p.html. ==References== category:Paintings of the Real Academia de Bellas Artes de San Fernando category:1795 paintings category:Self-portraits category:Francisco Goya portraits
title: Self-portrait at an Easel
